[rev_slider alias="home-modern" slidertitle="Home Modern"][/rev_slider] Quick Contact Email: saniga@7oroof.com Phone: +55 654 541 17 Our Location 2307 Beverley Brooklyn, New York 11226 United States. Save Your Time And Money! Read More Clean & Healthy Environment Read More Highly Trained & Professional Read More Watch Video! Our Cleaning Experts Work To Deliver The Highest Quality Of Clean You Can Always Count. Let Us Help You With Your Cleaning & Disinfecting Responsibilities Leading Provider Of Cleaning And Disinfecting Services In Huge Commercial Markets!

With more than 35 years getting to know every kind of client, from homeowners to facility & property managers to healthcare decision-makers. Our relentless passion for excellence and customer service means we continuously invest in improving our processes.

Saniga is a leading provider of cleaning and restoration services in both the residential and commercial markets, operating through an extensive service network.

Michael Brian Saniga Founder Cleaning Plans That Meets Your Needs Specialist Disinfection ServicesThat Fits Your Premises Professional Commercial Disinfection Services We will work directly with you to create a comprehensive, full-facility disinfection plan that ensures all touchpoints and critical areas of the facility are covered. Read More Coronavirus Cleaning & Disinfection Services Using our national disinfection expertise and experience in healthcare facilities, we handle the unique needs that pandemic has created by cleaning experts are essential. Read More Commercial Janitorial Cleaning Services If you're tired of replacing your janitorial service company due to their complacency or lack of follow-through, it's time to go with the experts who believe that a job. Read More Comprehensive & Custom Cleaning Services Using proprietary products, practices and equipment, we take care of businesses of all sizes proactively inspect our work to ensure the results meet our high standards Read More The Project Based Cleaning Services Whether it's a one-time janitorial cleaning or a single specialty cleaning such as carpet or upholstery care, our cleaning experts serve you with the professionalism. Read More Post Construction Cleaning Services We will help maintain a clean, healthy work environment in your facility with a cleaning schedule that matches your business's budget and your required needs. Read More For a cleaning that meets your highest standards, you need to Contact Us Quickly!! Explore All Services Why Should You Choose Us? Your Clients & Employees Deserve A Clean, Safe and Healthy Environment!!

The processes and systems we put in place provide a consistent, high quality service with a focus on safety. All our employees are trained and certified in the most current pandemic cleanup and disinfection techniques of clean for health.

Now more than ever, detailed disinfecting methods should be in place to protect the guests and employees of your facility.

Awards & Milestones Meet Our Experts Healthy Teams And
Social Distance Our experts are thoroughly trained and use proprietary disinfecting systems. Explore More Professional Grade
Disinfectant Reduce cleaning time by about 25% while ensuring a spotless, disinfected environment. Explore More Sterilized & Disinfected
Cleaning Tools We'll familiarize ourselves with your facility and then create a customized cleaning. Explore More 100% Satisfaction
Guarantee We offers a wide variety of services that can be customized to fit your Explore More Processes and systems we put in place provide high quality service. Read More

item.title: Home 01 - Video
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded:
Our Cleaning Experts Work To Deliver The Highest Quality Of Clean You Can Always Count. Let Us Help You With Your Cleaning & Disinfecting Responsibilities Leading Provider Of Cleaning And Disinfecting Services In Huge Commercial Markets!

With more than 35 years getting to know every kind of client, from homeowners to facility & property managers to healthcare decision-makers. Our relentless passion for excellence and customer service means we continuously invest in improving our processes.

Saniga is a leading provider of cleaning and restoration services in both the residential and commercial markets, operating through an extensive service network.

Michael Brian Saniga Founder

item.title: Home 01 - Why choose us
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded:
Why Should You Choose Us? Your Clients & Employees Deserve A Clean, Safe and Healthy Environment!!

The processes and systems we put in place provide a consistent, high quality service with a focus on safety. All our employees are trained and certified in the most current pandemic cleanup and disinfection techniques of clean for health.

Now more than ever, detailed disinfecting methods should be in place to protect the guests and employees of your facility.

Awards & Milestones Meet Our Experts Healthy Teams And
Social Distance Our experts are thoroughly trained and use proprietary disinfecting systems. Explore More Professional Grade
Disinfectant Reduce cleaning time by about 25% while ensuring a spotless, disinfected environment. Explore More Sterilized & Disinfected
Cleaning Tools We'll familiarize ourselves with your facility and then create a customized cleaning. Explore More 100% Satisfaction
Guarantee We offers a wide variety of services that can be customized to fit your Explore More

item.title: Home 01 - Industries We Serve
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded:
Industries We Serve Helping Different Industries And All Types Of Facilities!

Now more than ever, detailed disinfecting methods should be in place to protect the guests and employees of your facility and systems we provide a consistent, quality service with a focus on safety. All our experts are trained and certified in the most current pandemic cleanup and disinfection techniques of clean for health.

Request An Estimate 20% off Manufacturing Facilities We listen to your needs and respond with a customized plan specific to you, scheduled to best fit your business operations... Read More Educational Facilities Our educational facility cleaning experts are backed by over six decades of experience and understand the unique requirements of... Read More Medical Facilities Along with creating a clean, welcoming for each patient, our Patient-Centered Cleaning Program is designed to help you exceed expectations... Read More Government Buildings With our highly skilled, experienced cleaning technicians, you can be sure your place of worship is in the best hands to... Read More Financial Institutions As for our cleaning products, we use green cleaners that are effective without leaving behind any bothersome odors. We will also... Read More Religious Building We’ll work with you to fully understand your needs, accommodate any special requests and avoid any areas that you indicate. Read More 1000 Qualified Workers Using unique industry leading processes and extensive, customized training, our cleaning procedures have been developed to help a wide range of all facilities needs. 1000 Satisfied Clients Following best practices and procedures provided by leading organizations in the industry, our cleaning and disinfecting standards have been developed.

item.title: Home 01 - See How It Works!
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded:
See How It Works! Easy Steps For A Clean And
Healthy Environment 1 Provide Us With
The Details Just provide us the timing you want and we will set our schedule according to your need. Explore More 2 Pick The Suitable
Plan For You We come to you to inspect the area to prepare it for disinfection, and to take into concern. Explore More 3 Online Scheduling
In Few Clicks We carry out the disinfection during couple of hours depending on house size and amount. Explore More 4 Cleaning With Care &
leave quickly After disinfection was done successfully, we will leave and you’ll have no worries! Explore More For a cleaning that meets your highest standards, you need a dedicated team of trained specialists. We arrive at each visit with all supplies needed to thoroughly clean your home with our extensive Cleaning Process. Contact Us For More Information

item.content:encoded:
Coronavirus Cleaning

Using our national disinfection expertise and experience in healthcare facilities, we handle the unique needs that pandemic has created by cleaning experts are essential.

Expanded Disinfection Services Fits All needs! The processes and systems we put in place provide high quality service with a focus on safety. 01061245741 Explore Our Offers Download Brochure Our Report 2022 Company Brochure Overview

With more than 35 years getting to know every kind of client, from homeowners to facility & property managers to healthcare decision-makers. Our relentless passion for excellence and customer service means we invest in continuously improving our processes. Sanera is a leading provider of cleaning and restoration services in both the residential and commercial markets, operating through an extensive service network.

Business owners and property managers are key to keeping patrons, guests, patients and visitors safe. They are responsible for taking every step to ensure the health and safety of their communities. Whether a large retail shop,we have the disinfection know-how to customize a cleaning plan for your needs.

Mop all hard-surface floors$50Clean and disinfect breakroom$80Clean and disinfect bathrooms$60Empty trash and replace liner$75Vacuum upholstery, vents$45 Explode More Stats & Charts

When an employee or patient tests COVID positive, you should temporarily shut your doors. Our team can help you quickly open up again as our network of local businesses ensures fast response times and excellent care from a team that is equipped with the advanced tools and technology in adherence to CDC guidelines to get your facility safely open again.

Switching from after-hours to a daytime cleaning program can reduce your cleaning costs as well as energy expenses. Since no cleaning staff is required on-site after hours, there's no need for running lights or building heating/cooling, and your doors stay locked at the end of the day.

To keep your business running uninterrupted, we offer cost effective daytime janitorial cleaning services.

Best Value Commercial Providing commercial cleaning services which will help you protect your customers and employees, we care about clean and it shows in our work, our people, and also in our commitment to delivering on our word, every day. Window sills & ledges Appliance exteriors Hard surface floors Ranges and ovens Remove cobwebs Cabinet doors Empty trash Purchase Now $650 /Mon How It Works?!

We know each business facility is unique. That's why we offer a wide range of cleaning services and plans with scheduling and timing options that suit a variety of businesses. No matter how ordinary or exceptional the task, from carpet cleaning to air duct cleaning and other specialty services.

Why Us!

Keep your business open, safely. A primary driver of COVID-19’s infectiousness is the fact that people carriers long before they have symptoms. Routine cleaning and disinfecting are the only way to keep your environment safe from an unintentional COVID-19 outbreak.

Switching from after-hours to a daytime cleaning program can reduce your cleaning costs as well as energy expenses. Since no cleaning staff is required on-site after hours, there's no need for running lights or building heating/cooling, and your doors stay locked at the end of the day.

item.content:encoded:
Educational Facilities Industries We Serve
  • Manufacturing Facilities
  • Educational Facilities
  • Medical Facilities
  • Government Buildings
  • Financial Institutions
  • Religious Building
Expanded Disinfection Services Fits All needs! The processes and systems we put in place provide high quality service with a focus on safety. 01061245741 Explore Our Offers Download Brochure Our Report 2022 Company Brochure Overview

With more than 35 years getting to know every kind of client, from homeowners to facility & property managers to healthcare decision-makers. Our relentless passion for excellence and customer service means we invest in continuously improving our processes. Sanera is a leading provider of cleaning and restoration services in both the residential and commercial markets, operating through an extensive service network.

Business owners and property managers are key to keeping patrons, guests, patients and visitors safe. They are responsible for taking every step to ensure the health and safety of their communities. Whether a large retail shop,we have the disinfection know-how to customize a cleaning plan for your needs.

Hot Offers

We know each business facility is unique. That's why we offer a wide range of cleaning services and plans with scheduling and timing options that suit a variety of businesses. No matter how ordinary or exceptional the task, from carpet cleaning to air duct cleaning and other specialty services.

Mop all hard-surface floors$50Clean and disinfect breakroom$80Clean and disinfect bathrooms$60Empty trash and replace liner$75Vacuum upholstery, vents$45 Explode More Why Us!

Keep your business open, safely. A primary driver of COVID-19’s infectiousness is the fact that people carriers long before they have symptoms. Routine cleaning and disinfecting are the only way to keep your environment safe from an unintentional COVID-19 outbreak.

Healthy Teams And Social Distance Our experts are thoroughly trained and use proprietary disinfecting systems. Explore More Professional Grade Disinfectant Reduce cleaning time by about 25% while ensuring a spotless, disinfected environment. Explore More Sterilized & Disinfected Cleaning Tools We'll familiarize ourselves with your facility and then create a customized cleaning. Explore More Key Benifits Which Plan Is Right For Me? With any financial product that you buy, it is important that you know you are getting the best advice from a reputable company as often you will have to provide sensitive information online or over the internet. Do I have to commit to a contract? With any financial product that you buy, it is important that you know you are getting the best advice from a reputable company as often you will have to provide sensitive information online or over the internet. What Payment Methods Are Available? With any financial product that you buy, it is important that you know you are getting the best advice from a reputable company as often you will have to provide sensitive information online or over the internet. Best Choice Residential We provide residential house cleaning services and always focus on cleaning for health, our extensive industry experience give us a leg up when it comes to leaving your house cleaner, and healthier, than ever before. Window sills & ledges Appliance exteriors Hard surface floors Ranges and ovens Remove cobwebs Cabinet doors Empty trash Purchase Now $650 /Mon Best Value Commercial Providing commercial cleaning services which will help you protect your customers and employees, we care about clean and it shows in our work, our people, and also in our commitment to delivering on our word, every day. Office Buildings Government buildings Manufacturing Facilities Financial Institutions Educational Facilities Religious Building Medical Facilities Purchase Now $650 /Mon See How It Works! Easy Steps For A Clean And Healthy Environment 1 Provide Us With
The Details Just provide us the timing you want and we will set our schedule according to your need. Explore More 2 Pick The Suitable
Plan For You We come to you to inspect the area to prepare it for disinfection, and to take into concern. Explore More 3 Online Scheduling
In Few Clicks We carry out the disinfection during couple of hours depending on house size and amount. Explore More 4 Cleaning With Care &
leave quickly After disinfection was done successfully, we will leave and you’ll have no worries! Explore More For a cleaning that meets your highest standards, you need a dedicated team of trained specialists. We arrive at each visit with all supplies needed to thoroughly clean your home with our extensive Cleaning Process. Contact Us For More Information

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Our website address is: https://demo.cmssuperheroes.com/themeforest/saniga.

What personal data we collect and why we collect it

Comments

When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Contact forms

Cookies

If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Analytics

Who we share your data with

If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where we send your data

Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

Your contact information

Additional information

How we protect your data

What data breach procedures we have in place

What third parties we receive data from

What automated decision making and/or profiling we do with user data

Industry regulatory disclosure requirements

Our cleaning experts deliver the highest quality of clean you can always count, let us help you with all of your cleaning and disinfecting responsibilities now. Our Services Our Video! Delivering the highest standards of clean and guarantee to treat your home and office. 97% Customer Rating Get A Customized Cleaning Plan That Meets Your Needs Helping Industries And Huge Facilities! Our cleaning experts deliver the highest quality of clean you can always count, let us help you with all of your cleaning and disinfecting responsibilities now. Our Services Our Video! We proudly offer our proprietary Capture and Cleaning system, which works better. 97% Customer Rating Let Us Help You With Your Cleaning & Disinfecting Responsibilities Leading Provider Of Cleaning And Disinfecting Services In Huge Commercial Markets!

With more than 35 years getting to know every kind of client, from homeowners to facility & managers to healthcare decision-makers. Our relentless passion for excellence and customer service means we continuously invest in improving our processes.

Quality Control System, 100% Satisfaction Guarantee Highly Professional Staff, Accurate Testing Processes Unrivalled workmanship, Professional and Qualified Michael Brian Contact Us Watch Video! We Work To Deliver The Highest Quality Of Clean You Can Always Count.     Trained and certified in the most current pandemic cleanup Your Clients & Employees Deserve A Clean, Safe And Healthy Environment!!

    The processes and systems we put in place provide a consistent, high quality service with a focus on safety. All our employees are trained and certified in the most current pandemic cleanup and disinfection techniques of clean for health.

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded:
About Us

The processes and systems we put in place provide a consistent, high quality service with a focus on safety, our employees are trained and certified in the most current pandemic cleanup.

Our Services Our Video Home Watch Video! Our Cleaning Experts Work To Deliver The Highest Quality Of Clean You Can Always Count. Let Us Help You With Your Cleaning & Disinfecting Responsibilities Leading Provider Of Cleaning And Disinfecting Services In Huge Commercial Markets!

With more than 35 years getting to know every kind of client, from homeowners to facility & property managers to healthcare decision-makers. Our relentless passion for excellence and customer service means we continuously invest in improving our processes.

Saniga is a leading provider of cleaning and restoration services in both the residential and commercial markets, operating through an extensive service network.

Michael Brian Saniga Founder Why Should You Choose Us? Your Clients & Employees Deserve A Clean, Safe and Healthy Environment!!

The processes and systems we put in place provide a consistent, high quality service with a focus on safety. All our employees are trained and certified in the most current pandemic cleanup and disinfection techniques of clean for health.

Now more than ever, detailed disinfecting methods should be in place to protect the guests and employees of your facility.

Awards & Milestones Meet Our Experts Healthy Teams And
Social Distance Our experts are thoroughly trained and use proprietary disinfecting systems. Explore More Professional Grade
Disinfectant Reduce cleaning time by about 25% while ensuring a spotless, disinfected environment. Explore More Sterilized & Disinfected
Cleaning Tools We'll familiarize ourselves with your facility and then create a customized cleaning. Explore More 100% Satisfaction
Guarantee We offers a wide variety of services that can be customized to fit your Explore More Processes and systems we put in place provide high quality service. Read More The best disinfectants and procedures to keep individuals safe. Read More 1% Customer Satisfaction Based on 750+ reviews and 6,154 Cleaned Industries. item.title: How It Works
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded:
How It Works

The processes and systems we put in place provide a consistent, high quality service with a focus on safety, our employees are trained and certified in the most current pandemic cleanup.

Contact Us Home See How It Works! Easy Steps For A Clean And
Healthy Environment 1 Provide Us With
The Details Just provide us the timing you want and we will set our schedule according to your need. Explore More 2 Pick The Suitable
Plan For You We come to you to inspect the area to prepare it for disinfection, and to take into concern. Explore More 3 Online Scheduling
In Few Clicks We carry out the disinfection during couple of hours depending on house size and amount. Explore More 4 Cleaning With Care &
leave quickly After disinfection was done successfully, we will leave and you’ll have no worries! Explore More For a cleaning that meets your highest standards, you need a dedicated team of trained specialists. We arrive at each visit with all supplies needed to thoroughly clean your home with our extensive Cleaning Process. Contact Us For More Information Best Value Commercial Providing commercial cleaning services which will help you protect your customers and employees, we care about clean and it shows in our work, our people, and also in our commitment to delivering on our word, every day. Office Buildings Government buildings Manufacturing Facilities Financial Institutions Educational Facilities Religious Building Medical Facilities Purchase Now $650 /Mon Best Choice Residential We provide residential house cleaning services and always focus on cleaning for health, our extensive industry experience give us a leg up when it comes to leaving your house cleaner, and healthier, than ever before. Window sills & ledges Appliance exteriors Hard surface floors Ranges and ovens Remove cobwebs Cabinet doors Empty trash Purchase Now $650 /Mon 1% Customer Satisfaction Based on 750+ reviews and 6,154 Cleaned Industries. They will be at top of my list the next time I need a housecleaning. I was extremely pleased with the service I received. It was easy efficient to set up the cleaning, the price was fair and up front, and the cleaning team did a top-notch job. Execellent!! Sami Wade, Promina Inc They will be at top of my list the next time I need a housecleaning. I was extremely pleased with the service I received. It was easy efficient to set up the cleaning, the price was fair and up front, and the cleaning team did a top-notch job. Execellent!! Peter Alan, Promina Inc They will be at top of my list the next time I need a housecleaning. I was extremely pleased with the service I received. It was easy efficient to set up the cleaning, the price was fair and up front, and the cleaning team did a top-notch job. Execellent!! John Doe, Promina Inc

item.title: Our Locations
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded:
Locations

The processes and systems we put in place provide a consistent, high quality service with a focus on safety, our employees are trained and certified in the most current pandemic cleanup.

item.title: Help & FAQs
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded:
FAQs

The processes and systems we put in place provide a consistent, high quality service with a focus on safety, our employees are trained and certified in the most current pandemic cleanup.

Contact Us Home Frequently Asked Questions What Are You Looking For? Which Plan Is Right For Me? With any financial product that you buy, it is important that you know you are getting the best advice from a reputable company as often you will have to Do I have to commit to a contract? With any financial product that you buy, it is important that you know you are getting the best advice from a reputable company as often you will have to For a cleaning that meets your highest standards, you need to Contact Us Quickly!! Why Should You Choose Us? Your Clients & Employees Deserve A Clean, Safe and Healthy Environment!!

The processes and systems we put in place provide a consistent, high quality service with a focus on safety. All our employees are trained and certified in the most current pandemic cleanup and disinfection techniques of clean for health.

Now more than ever, detailed disinfecting methods should be in place to protect the guests and employees of your facility.

Awards & Milestones Meet Our Experts Healthy Teams And
Social Distance Our experts are thoroughly trained and use proprietary disinfecting systems. Explore More Professional Grade
Disinfectant Reduce cleaning time by about 25% while ensuring a spotless, disinfected environment. Explore More Sterilized & Disinfected
Cleaning Tools We'll familiarize ourselves with your facility and then create a customized cleaning. Explore More 100% Satisfaction
Guarantee We offers a wide variety of services that can be customized to fit your Explore More Processes and systems we put in place provide high quality service. Read More The best disinfectants and procedures to keep individuals safe. Read More 1% Customer Satisfaction Based on 750+ reviews and 6,154 Cleaned Industries. They will be at top of my list the next time I need a housecleaning. I was extremely pleased with the service I received. It was easy efficient to set up the cleaning, the price was fair and up front, and the cleaning team did a top-notch job. Execellent!! It was easy efficient to set up the cleaning, the price was fair and up front, and the cleaning team did a top-notch job. Execellent!! item.title: Services
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded:
Helping Industries And Huge Facilities!

Our cleaning experts deliver the highest quality of clean you can always count,
let us help you with all of your cleaning and disinfecting responsibilities now.

Request An Estimate Cleaning Plans That Meets Your Needs Specialist Disinfection Services That Fits Your Premises Professional Commercial Disinfection Services We will work directly with you to create a comprehensive, full-facility disinfection plan that ensures all touchpoints and critical areas of the facility are covered. Read More Coronavirus Cleaning & Disinfection Services Using our national disinfection expertise and experience in healthcare facilities, we handle the unique needs that pandemic has created by cleaning experts are essential. Read More Commercial Janitorial Cleaning Services If you're tired of replacing your janitorial service company due to their complacency or lack of follow-through, it's time to go with the experts who... Read More Comprehensive & Custom Cleaning Services Using proprietary products, practices and equipment, we take care of businesses of all sizes proactively inspect our work to ensure the results meet our high... Read More The Project Based Cleaning Services Whether it's a one-time janitorial cleaning or a single specialty cleaning such as carpet or upholstery care, our cleaning experts serve you with the professionalism. Read More Post Construction Cleaning Services We will help maintain a clean, healthy work environment in your facility with a cleaning schedule that matches your business's budget and your required needs. Read More Industries We Serve Helping Different Industries And All Types Of Facilities!

Now more than ever, detailed disinfecting methods should be in place to protect the guests and employees of your facility and systems we provide a consistent, quality service with a focus on safety. All our experts are trained and certified in the most current pandemic cleanup and disinfection techniques of clean for health.

Request An Estimate 20% off Manufacturing Facilities We listen to your needs and respond with a customized plan specific to you, scheduled to best fit your business operations... Read More Educational Facilities Our educational facility cleaning experts are backed by over six decades of experience and understand the unique requirements of... Read More Medical Facilities Along with creating a clean, welcoming for each patient, our Patient-Centered Cleaning Program is designed to help you exceed expectations... Read More 20% off Government Buildings With our highly skilled, experienced cleaning technicians, you can be sure your place of worship is in the best hands to... Read More Financial Institutions As for our cleaning products, we use green cleaners that are effective without leaving behind any bothersome odors. We will also... Read More Religious Building We’ll work with you to fully understand your needs, accommodate any special requests and avoid any areas that you indicate. Read More 1000 Qualified Workers Using unique industry leading processes and extensive, customized training, our cleaning procedures have been developed to help a wide range of all facilities needs. 1000 Satisfied Clients Following best practices and procedures provided by leading organizations in the industry, our cleaning and disinfecting standards have been developed. See How It Works! Easy Steps For A Clean And
Healthy Environment 1 Provide Us With
The Details Just provide us the timing you want and we will set our schedule according to your need. Explore More 2 Pick The Suitable
Plan For You We come to you to inspect the area to prepare it for disinfection, and to take into concern. Explore More 3 Online Scheduling
In Few Clicks We carry out the disinfection during couple of hours depending on house size and amount. Explore More 4 Cleaning With Care &
leave quickly After disinfection was done successfully, we will leave and you’ll have no worries! Explore More For a cleaning that meets your highest standards, you need a dedicated team of trained specialists. We arrive at each visit with all supplies needed to thoroughly clean your home with our extensive Cleaning Process. Contact Us For More Information Your Clients & Employees Deserve A Clean, Safe And Healthy Environment!!

We continuously invest in improving our processes, our employees and our relationship with each and every business we serve.

Explore More Our Products Residential Cleaning Provide residential house cleaning services and focus on cleaning for health, our extensive industry. Read More Commercial Cleaning Providing commercial cleaning services to help you protect your customers and employees. Read More Request An Estimate For a cleaning that meets your highest standards, you need a dedicated team of trained specialists with all supplies needed to thoroughly clean your home.










    97% Customer Rating 1% Customer Satisfaction Based on 750+ reviews and 6,154 Cleaned Industries. They will be at top of my list the next time I need a housecleaning. I was extremely pleased with the service I received. It was easy efficient to set up the cleaning, the price was fair and up front, and the cleaning team did a top-notch job. Execellent!! Sami Wade, Promina Inc They will be at top of my list the next time I need a housecleaning. I was extremely pleased with the service I received. It was easy efficient to set up the cleaning, the price was fair and up front, and the cleaning team did a top-notch job. Execellent!! Peter Alan, Promina Inc They will be at top of my list the next time I need a housecleaning. I was extremely pleased with the service I received. It was easy efficient to set up the cleaning, the price was fair and up front, and the cleaning team did a top-notch job. Execellent!! John Doe, Promina Inc

item.title: #2 The Difference Between Bacterial and Viral Infections How to Avoid Them
item.dc:creator: MikeDooley
item.content:encoded:
While bacterial infections and viral infections are extremely common, both come with their own particular set of mild and severe risks. To reduce your facility's risk of exposure, it's important to first understand the difference between a virus and bacteria. Use this guide from ServiceMaster Clean to learn what viral and bacterial infections are, what risks they pose, and how you can limit your exposure to them.

Bacterial infections are single-celled microorganisms that can survive on their own. Some bacteria are harmless, while other types can cause illness. Luckily, many of the more serious bacterial infections a person can get can be treated with antibiotics. Bacterial infections are typically derived from the following causes.

Viral infections are smaller than bacteria, and require a living host to remain active. Like bacterial infections, some types of viral infections are harmless, while other strands can do serious damage. Viral infections are typically derived from the following causes.

Mop all hard-surface floors$50Clean and disinfect breakroom$80Clean and disinfect bathrooms$60Empty trash and replace liner$75Vacuum upholstery, vents$45 Explode More

We know how dangerous bacteria and viruses can be if left unchecked. That's why our healthcare janitorial services were built around infection control and prevention, risk reduction, and environment improvement. Using the best practices and procedures set in place by OSHA and other leading industry organizations, our expert staff can deliver a deep clean in your facility.

To reduce your facility's risk of exposure, it's important to first understand the difference between a virus and bacteria. Use this guide from ServiceMaster Clean to learn what viral and bacterial infections are, what risks they pose, and how you can limit your exposure to them.

While bacterial infections and viral infections are extremely common, both come with their own particular set of mild and severe risks. To reduce your facility's risk of exposure, it's important to first understand the difference between a virus and bacteria. Use this guide from ServiceMaster Clean to learn what viral and bacterial infections are, what risks they pose, and how you can limit your exposure to them.

Bacterial infections are single-celled microorganisms that can survive on their own. Some bacteria are harmless, while other types can cause illness. Luckily, many of the more serious bacterial infections a person can get can be treated with antibiotics. Bacterial infections are typically derived from the following causes.

Viral infections are smaller than bacteria, and require a living host to remain active. Like bacterial infections, some types of viral infections are harmless, while other strands can do serious damage. Viral infections are typically derived from the following causes.

Viral infections are typically derived from the following causes.<\/p>"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false},{"id":"63311e99","elType":"section","settings":{"structure":"20","css_classes":"p-tb-10"},"elements":[{"id":"2b1b6cb","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":50,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"71ba599a","elType":"widget","settings":{"image":{"url":"https:\/\/demo.cmssuperheroes.com\/themeforest\/saniga\/wp-content\/uploads\/post-7.jpg","id":557},"image_size":"custom","image_custom_dimension":{"width":"350","height":"415"},"align":"center","link_to":"file","open_lightbox":"yes"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"image"}],"isInner":false},{"id":"c5b6ae0","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":50,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"5277a804","elType":"widget","settings":{"heading_text":"Starter Plan","subheading_text":"The perfect plan for small business","description_text":"Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo.","price_currency":"$","price_value":"29","price_duration":"Month","feature_lists":[{"feature_text":"Mop all hard-surface floors","feature_price":"$50","_id":"75c5628"},{"feature_text":"Clean and disinfect breakroom","feature_price":"$80","_id":"dac3569"},{"feature_text":"Clean and disinfect bathrooms","feature_price":"$60","_id":"7a6331a"},{"feature_text":"Empty trash and replace liner","feature_price":"$75","_id":"0cda315"},{"feature_text":"Vacuum upholstery, vents","feature_price":"$45","_id":"107742c"}],"feature2_lists":[{"feature_text":"Your feature text #7","_id":"8e4fdb2"},{"feature_text":"Your feature text #8","_id":"729387d"},{"feature_text":"Your feature text #9","_id":"f4efc61"},{"feature_text":"Your feature text #10","_id":"0b5b7d1"},{"feature_text":"Your feature text #11","_id":"b3ec849"},{"feature_text":"Your feature text #12","_id":"7c17f78"}],"btn_text":"Explode More","btn_size":"lg","align":"justify"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"cms_pricing_table"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false},{"id":"4d4abe16","elType":"section","settings":[],"elements":[{"id":"29c5896c","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100,"_inline_size":null},"elements":[{"id":"5f41167d","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

We know how dangerous bacteria and viruses can be if left unchecked. That's why our healthcare janitorial services were built around infection control and prevention, risk reduction, and environment improvement. Using the best practices and procedures set in place by OSHA and other leading industry organizations, our expert staff can deliver a deep clean in your facility.<\/p>

While bacterial infections and viral infections are extremely common, both come with their own particular set of mild and severe risks. To reduce your facility's risk of exposure, it's important to first understand the difference between a virus and bacteria. Use this guide from ServiceMaster Clean to learn what viral and bacterial infections are, what risks they pose, and how you can limit your exposure to them.<\/p>"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]

item.title: Сleaning Sponge
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: The direct insert style liquid flow sensor with stainless steel/PPS plastic tip combines flow sensing with a built-in transmitter for an all in one flow measuring system. This device fits all 1-1/2 to over 36 in pipes, and it is intended for direct installation into the pipe through a 1 in NPT hole. In the hot tap installation, the sensor is mounted in the pipe under pressure by attaching a service saddle or weld-on fitting to the pipe. Then the sensor assembly is attached to an isolation valve and extended into the pipeline to measure flow. Hot tap installations are often required in retrofit projects, but even in new construction, a hot tap sensor can be desirable for service considerations.
